name: BulletField HarvestMayhem
description:
In this 2D TopDown World, you have a Field of Bullets, Projectiles that you can pickup and make your own Ammo. But beware, the ones you haven't picked up are still there, acting as a barrier in your LineOfSight.

The More bullets you collect, the Less cover you and the enemies have. 

Use WASD to move around, Shift to Boost, Mouse to aim and Left Click to Shoot. Your boosting however expends your shield as well. 

Do look around the menus to find some additional tips.
